activities: Lanyon Solutions, Inc. provides software to the hospitality industry for housing related to group meetings. Individual attendees provide certain personal information, including credit card data, as part of the registration process. Lanyon helps all parties realize the opportunities available in the effective management of meetings and events. Lanyon licenses its technology to organizations (its “Corporate Clients” or “Licensees”) including third- party meeting planning organizations, universities, corporations and businesses, associations, government organizations, and co-brand partners. Lanyon also provides access to its applications to suppliers of services to Corporate Clients (“Suppliers”). These suppliers include hotels, convention and visitors bureaus, destination management companies, and other providers of services needed by its Corporate Clients. Individuals (“Buyers”) use this technology on behalf of Corporate Clients to manage meetings, and to purchase services for these meetings and events from suppliers.
